house_listing.house_description: Waterfront on pretty lake, bulkheaded, deep water access when city dredging complete & shore dr. Bridge is raised in 2001. Views of pretty lake. 3 br-luxury custom master ste open 2nd floor plan w/kit-dining/great rm. 876 sq ft gar w/9' ceilings, rear garage door for water activity access.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Central Realty RE/MAX Central Realty
